DOC.detailed_description: This randomize case-control study perform Obstetrics Gynecology Department University Hospital , period October 2013 till July 2015 . One hundred twenty woman unexplained infertility include study . Written , inform , consent , take woman explain nature aim study . The 120 patient divide randomly two group ( base alternate week referral clinic ) . All patient receive Clomiphene citrate ( CC ) , Human menopausal gonadotrophin , accord follow protocol : Clomiphene Citrate ( Clomiphene tablet , Clomiphene citrate 50 mg ) , 100 mg/day 5 consecutive day , therapy initiated cycle day 3 . Human menopausal gonadotrophin ( Merional 75 international unit ) , injected intra-muscularly , dose 150 iu/day , day 3 , 5 , 7 , 9 menstrual cycle . Serial transvaginal ultra sound perform patient start day 10 repeat every day . Human menopausal gonadotrophin continue daily , dose , follicle reach 18-22 mm . When dominant follicle reach 18-22 mm , measure transvaginal ultrasound , human chorionic gonadotropin ( 5000 international unit ) inject intramuscularly , dose 5,000 - 10,000 IU , time intercourse advise , 36 h human chorionic gonadotropin injection day . Vaginal ultrasound do 60 h human chorionic gonadotropin injection confirm follicular rupture . On day 5 cycle , Doppler examination perform patient . Also day 5 , group II patient , local endometrial injury perform . Doppler study repeat , patient , day prescribe human chorionic gonadotropin . Technique trans vaginal ultrasound : Trans vaginal sonography examination perform patient lithotomy position use transvaginal transducer color Doppler facility , longitudinal view uterus obtain , color Doppler mode activate . The endometrial subendometrial blood flow distribution pattern determine demonstrate pulsatile color signal sub endometrial endometrial region . Doppler sonography perform vessel high color intensity within innermost endometrial sub endometrial area . The insonation angle keep 0° identify course small spiral artery . After confirm waveform continuous , average three five cardiac cycle select calculation resistance index ( RI ) , pulsatility index ( PI ) . The vessel low PI consider statistical analysis . Uterine circulation assess simultaneously examination ; bilateral uterine artery sample lateral cervix near internal o . Mean level uterine RI PI use analysis.on day human chorionic gonadotropin administration endometrial thickness measure , report . day The endometrial pattern evaluate describe multilayered non-multilayered endometrium . A trilaminar endometrium present triple-line pattern hyperechogenic outer line well-defined central echogenic line hypoechogenic black area line . A non trilaminar endometrium consist homogeneous endometrial pattern , characterize either hyperechogenic isoechoic endometrium . Technique endometrial injury : Endometrial injury do patient study group . It do day 5 , complete aseptic condition , anesthesia , give case . Endometrial local injury perform posterior wall , midline , 10-15 mm fundus use pipelle endometrial sampling ( Pipelle ) .
DOC.criteria: age Between 20 35 year Body mass index 1829 kg/m2 primary infertility two year , plan IVF/intracytoplasmic sperm injection trial Normal ovulation confirm previous US Normal hormonal profile follicle stimulate hormone , luteinizing hormone , prolactin , Antimullerian hormone ( AMH ) 1 ng/ml Normal hysterosalpingography Normal laparoscopic find normal semen analysis , accord World Health Organization 2010 Absence inclusion criterion History previous laparotomy Patients history may suggest endometriosis Associated chronic medical condition e.g . cardiac disease , diabetes , renal disease… etc .
